thread.section_title: CoolFrames.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CoolFrames.com | www.coolframes.com | 6 of 16
thread.title: UnkaBob

author: UnkaBob
title: UnkaBob
text: My frames are becoming very hard to find. I've been wearing this style for about 20 years. But CoolFrames had them. Not in the exact size I've used but pretty damn close. Now I have a new set of frames for this coming year when I upgrade my Rx. Couldn't be happier with the service as well. I received a phone call to verify my internet order and had the frames within a week. Although it wasn't an emergency, I know that I can count on them in the future if I need fast service.
